title: Van hnuai khuavel sakhming chhiarin
lyrics:
Vanhnuai khuavel sakhming chhiar in,
Lalber Kaisara chuan,
A sawm vel e hnamtin naufa,
Khuarei an chang zo ta.

Aw Bethlehem ka ngai a che,
Berampute ram tuanna,
Serafim ten zai an vawrna chu,
Ka Lal pianna i lo ni.

A riang ngei e vanlal fa chu,
A zalna ran thleng an;
A lo piang e mari hraichawi,
Bawng In tlawm zar hnuaiah,

Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Vanhnuai mi zawng zawng tan;
Leiah kumkhua in rem leng rawh se,
Remna lal a piang ta.

Isu kan hnenah lo cheng rawh,
Zantlai khuarei pawh in;
Lawmin tlaikhua min var pui rawh,
I hming chawimawi tur in.
